The Evillious Chronicles:
Greed Arc Characters

Even if you’re a scoundrel,
If you pay money I’ll save you.
—Judgment of Corruption

Characters associated with Gallerian Marlon and the Dark Star Scandal.

Gallerian Marlon

ガレリアン＝マーロンGARERIAN=MAARON

A judge of the Dark Star Bureau and father of Michelle Marlon. He is represented by KAITO.

Ma

Ma(エムエー)EMUEE

A playwright and acquaintance of Gallerian. She is represented by Megurine Luka.

Michelle Marlon

ミッシェル＝マーロンMISSHERU=MAARON

Gallerian's young daughter. She is represented by Hatsune Miku.

Bruno Zero

ブルーノ＝ゼロBURUUNO=ZERO

Gallerian's butler and aide, as well as the leader of PN codenamed No. 0.

Shiro Netsuma

シロ＝ネツマSHIRO=NETSUMA

A member of PN codenamed No. 1. She is represented by Yowane Haku.

Hel Jakko

ヘール＝ヤーコHEERU=YAAKO

A clerk of the Dark Star Bureau and a member of PN codenamed No. 2.

Feng Li

フェン＝リーFEN=RII

A member of PN codenamed No. 3 with the appearance of a tiger.

Postman

ポストマンPOSUTOMAN

A mysterious member of PN codenamed No. 4.

Hanma Baldured

ハンマ＝バルドルドHANMA=BARUDORUDO

The head judge of the Dark Star Bureau.

Loki Freezis

ロキ=フリージスROKI=FURIIJISU

Gallerian's coworker and Mira's boyfriend.

Mira Yarera

ミラ=ヤレラMIRA=YARERA

Loki's girlfriend.

Tony Ausdin

トニー＝オースディンTONII=OOSUDIN

A Union State of Evillious general and Gallerian's old friend. He is represented by Tonio.

Lich Arklow

リッチ＝アークロウRICCHI=AAKUROU

The manager of the Graveyard restaurant.

Eater Sabella

イーター＝サーベアIITAA=SAABEA

A chef at the Graveyard restaurant.

Waiter

ウェイターWEITAA

A waiter at the Graveyard restaurant who told Gallerian the story of Banica Conchita. She is represented by Kagamine Rin.

Demon of Greed

強(ごう)欲(よく)の(の)悪(あく)魔(ま)gouyoku no akuma

A demon residing inside the spoon.

Master of the Hellish Yard

冥(めい)界(かい)の(の)主(ぬし)meikai no nushi

The woman who decides whether people are sent to Heaven or Hell. She is portrayed by GUMI.
